df2 <- deals %>% filter(investment_stage != "Acquisition") %>%
         group_by(sector) %>%
         summarise(total_deal = sum(deal_value)) %>%
         top_n(10, total_deal) %>%
         arrange(desc(total_deal)) %>%
  fmt_number(
    .,
    decimals = 2,
    suffixing = TRUE
  )
